item.title: Shunde Longjiang Poly Man Killed Golden Retriever Poodle Owner Detained
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: In the past few years, the government has been trying to improve the quality of life for the people of Hong Kong. The owner of the golden retriever, Mr. Wang, told reporters that his 70-year-old parents in the course of the dispute both sickness hospitalized, and the incident so far, the owner of the poodle and his family never apologized to himself and his parents, also from the future hospital to see his parents.
